page.title: 18Ecology.
page.content: In our block there is one river,many small ponds, both natural and man made.Also numerous streams,brooks and open ditches.Found in these waterways are many spiecisof fish including pike,rainbow and brown trout stickleback and minnow.There are many keen anglers in the area and several fishing competitions are held.During a recent visit to a local pond the following creatuers were found,frogs, toads,tadpoles,fresh water shrimps, pond skaters,water beetles,water worms ,mayfly nymph,stickleback,dragonfly lava,cadis fly lava,water louse, water snail,whirligig beetle and newts.Many living things which are found in our rural water are too small to be seen by the naked eye such amoeba and algae.Water weeds grow in all our rivers and ponds,and along the banks of the streams and rivers.
